content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing coal for smelting
- Ensure that there is enough coal in your inventory to insert into the furnaces. Regularly check your inventory and gather more coal if necessary.

### Errors when using furnaces without sufficient fuel
- Always monitor the fuel levels in your furnaces. If a furnace is out of fuel, it will not smelt the iron ore. Make sure to supply them with coal or other fuel sources.

### Errors when attempting to insert items into furnaces
- If you encounter messages indicating "Not enough coal left in inventory to insert into the furnace," it is a sign that you need to gather more coal before trying to smelt iron ore.
